details.description: If you issue horse passports you must be authorised by the appropriate national body
details.licence_short_description: Horse passports are issued by the relevant devolved government agency.
details.licence_overview:
If you issue horse passports you must be authorised by:

  • in England: the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (Defra)
  • in Northern Ireland: the Department for Agriculture and Rural Development,
  • in Scotland: the Scottish Government
  • in Wales: the National Assembly for Wales,
